title: Bots in bot games
body:
Hello everybody!

Hope everyone had a happy holiday.

I've been playing bot games for the past couple weeks and noticed and increase in the amount of bots on the player team during Summoner's Rift.  The bots usually have a name like "Joan" which is either preceded or followed by a random combination of letters with every other letter capitalized. THey they always buy boots first and go to a random lane (4 could go to one lane) they "b" when at about 33% percent life then pick another random lane. THey also rarely attack towers and use abilities randomly without rhyme or reason. Over the past couple weeks it has turned from 1-2 on a team to now having 4 bots on my team. I'm usually still able to win despite this, but it's not without work.

I have been reporting them for botting, but nothing seems to happen. Are these bots allowed as they greatly diminish the experience of players? Has anyone else experienced this?

Happy New Year! Hope it's fetch.

Gretchen

and sadly there isn't much Riot can do about the bots
for every bot they take down another 5-10 can easily take its place

your best bet is get out of co-op vs ai asap and only play it if u need to finish off a quest that you'd rather not do in a match made game

I think they should negate the penalty for dodging, in co-op vs AI games only, to combat this problem. I don't know if permanent IP bans will fix it (since the creation of bots vs the destruction of bots ratio is in favor of bots being around forever) but it could be a viable option as well. At least to help do some damage control. It's true that since TT went down there's been a massive influx of bots in the bot games. i personally used the co-op vs AI mode to learn new champs; and now, unfortunately, that's all but a memory since its basically carry practice, now that the bots have moved in.

Just do what I do: Check the number of bots when you're in champ select. If it's 3 or more, roll a 1v9 champ like Darius and revel in how absolutely broken you get from all the shutdown bonuses.

I am starting to think riot wants these accounts as it artifically boosts the live player base.

Anyway, supposedly my friend said that, in his words, "Riot said 'deal with it.' " I don't think anything he said is true, but I don't doubt that Riot kinda doesn't care about bots. I don't know.
